channel.title: ::Bomb help - tell me if it's right please

item.title: ::Bomb help - tell me if it's right please
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

This is what I have so far.

if(command.startsWith(“bomb”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)))
{
attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 25);
AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
hitDiff = 99 + misc.random(playerMaxHit);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
sendMessage(“You bomb and poison your targets!”);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
stillgfx(572, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); //572 = Hole in ground
stillgfx(571, enemyY2, enemyX2); //571 = Dust storm
stillgfx(582, enemyY2, enemyX2);
stillgfx(498, enemyY2, enemyX2); //498 = Fireball
stillgfx(547, enemyY2, enemyX2); //547 = Exploding bomb with smoke
stillgfx(437, enemyY2, enemyX2); // 437 = Retribution
stillgfx(287, enemyY2, enemyX2); // 287 = HUGE Explosion
stillgfx(453, enemyY2, enemyX2);//Flames = 453
}

Read full topic
item.source: ::Bomb help - tell me if it's right please
